Method Detail

getData

void getData(org.joda.time.DateTime from,
             org.joda.time.DateTime until,
             boolean getStations)
             throws StaticDataLoadException
Retrieve data from a DataRepository within a given time-frame

Parameters:
from - The start date of the time-frame, or null to not specify
until - The end date of the time-frame, or null to not specify
getStations - True if the list of Stations should be retrieved, false otherwise
Throws:
StaticDataLoadException - Thrown if data retrieval failed

The retrieved set of Sections

The retrieved set of Stations
